verbose_text: M2 macrophages are characterized by an IL-12 low IL-10 high IL-1decoyR high IL-1RA high phenotype with efficient phagocytic activity, high expression of mannose and galactose receptors, high levels of scavenging molecules, and high expression of specific markers of alternative activation, such as arginase-1 (Arg 1), found in inflammatory zone 1 (Fizz1) and chitinase-3-like protein 3 (Ym1).
evidence: expression of mannose and galactose receptors
